Package cmput301.f13t01.readstory

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Viewable
    The interface that must be implemented by any class that has viewable objects, providing a means to get these views.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MediaInteractionManager
    Class for managing interaction and interaction options with Media.
    ReadFragmentActivity
    ReadFragmentActivity, the activity called for reading any story fragment.
    ReadFragmentView
    The view for the ReadFragmentActivity.
    StoryManager
    ReadStoryManager is the connection between various activities and a story.
    ViewAnnotationActivity
    This activity allows the user to preview a particular storyFragment's annotation.
